greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n consists of n-1 zeros followed by A000292(n).
comment: Essentially triangle T(n,k), read by rows, given by (0,0,0,0,0,0,0,...) DELTA (4,-3/2,5/6,-1/3,3/5,-1/10,1/2,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,...) where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Nov 14 2011
